info.title: Star Catching
info.author: FatQuack
info.description: Collect the stars and avoid the bullets.
info.details: Use the Wiimote's DPAD to move your space ship and collect as many stars as possible.  A star will gain you a point, but hitting a bullet will loose you a five. If you hit a bullet when you have fewer than four points, you are out.  See how long you can last.
